question: I always find a hair in my food or a stone. I am very upset about this, this happen only to me? Some one told me that this happens because some one is hungry & thinking of you. Is this true?
answer:
QUESTION
Every time I sit to eat food I always (quit often) find a hair in my food or if not while I chew the food I find a stone I am very up set about this, this happen only to me please explain? Some one told me that this happens because some one is hungry & thinking of you. Is this true? & What should I do please help?
ANSWER


Share:
The explanation given for the hair and stone in the food is baseless. Do not believe that.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
